hardware.name: Self Destructing Passwords
hardware.description: An experiment in cybersecurity. When you insert a raspberry pi pico (or a rubber ducky) into a laptop with this script, the script automatically grabs your chrome passwords, decrypts them, and sends them to me in a notification.

hardware.name: Motion Sensing Lights
hardware.description: COMING SOON - A small device that attaches onto a wall switch and turns the lights on or off based on how many people are in the room.

software.name: SearchDeck
software.description: A search engine compiler. Collects results from 4 different search engines and smartly compiles them onto one page.

software.name: Climalearn
software.description: Easily see how climate change is adversely affecting the Earth and find out what you can do to stop it.

software.name: MyT1D
software.description: A mobile application to help type 1 diabetic patients manage their diabetes easier.

software.name: Replit CLI
software.description: A CLI application to connect to Replit.

software.name: Replit Oauth
software.description: An unofficial third-party oauth imitation for Replit.

software.name: Token Revoker
software.description: A discord bot that continuously scans the server for leaked discord bot tokens and slack tokens and automatically revokes them.

software.name: Reflux Marketplace
software.description: DEPRECATED - The marketplace for the popular Replit theming extension, Reflux.
